message.body: Hey how's the bat wings coming out?
Have you turned into a nocturnal creature?
Only coming out to feed under the dark blanket of the night?
Why hello webfoot. I couldn't figure out how to add you as a preferred text partner, but here you are nonetheless.
The bat was awesome, but stolen and crashed repeatedly by the drunken elderly.
They didn't notice its wings hitting all the lamp posts
Stolen by old folks? What?
Old people can miss stuff like that
Why were old people hitting lamp post with it
They couldn't figure out which of the 6 bikes was in control of the wings or steering, but pedaled forward anyway. Silly geriatrics.
Why did you let old people drive it?
They can be dangerous in a car, I can only imagine what they would do with half a dozen bikes strapped together.
We didn't let them. They got on when no one was looking and took off. They were chased down on foot and halted by hand, flintstones style.
I hope there is a video of this
It sounds hilarious
Although probably not to you because they trashed your project
It was hilarious, but ruined all of our after work free time for the next week. All done now.
You fixed it then?
Yeah, it needed new steel, aluminum bent back into shape, and new wing fabric. We got there.
Or is it just part of your secret bat cave?
That's good news. What was the event that you made it for
It was this all-night interactive public art festival in St. Paul. People felt great license.
So are you from St. Paul originally
Yea I guess if its interactive you kinda invited that then.
No, just visiting. I guess we did. Oops. Only soft sculpture without mechanics from here on out.
How are your cat fur sculptures?
The pet fur casts are part of two sculptures one of which is done and the other still has a week or so to go
So where are you from
